activities:
Veer West's product, FormAssembly.com, is a service provider that helps users easily create online web forms. These users create forms to collect data from their respondents. 

Veer West and FormAssembly.com do not share or sell any of our users' information, nor do we use, share, or sell, their respondents' information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
